title: The webpage having issues loading.
content: Regards, Sir/Madam The page functions as expected in Chrome but not in Firefox. You can find a graphic designer in Sanger at this website: https://jhtackettmarketing.com/. The website symbol in the top left corner still shows that contact has been made even if the page is now blank. Does anyone know why Firefox is unable to load the website?
creator: denvertulex

title: Opening Firefox as a new window
content: Until a few days ago, Firefox on my computer always opened as a new window when I clicked on the icon at the bottom of the taskbar. But then suddenly something happened; the icon went "white" and I had to first remove it and then put it back in the taskbar. Now Firefox does not open in the same way anymore. To be able to open a new window, you must right-click and select "open in new window". Previously, the "opening of a new window" happened automatically when I clicked on the icon. How do I get the old "opening" back, which I think is better?
creator: LJV777

title: Pinned Tabs Randomly Disappear!
content:
Why offer pinned tabs if they are going to get lost when you add Firefox to another device or sometimes it just randomly erases all the ones I had booked marked!

Is this something Firefox plans to fix?

If not seems like it is a bad feature to offer if it does not work!

Is there another option that works?
creator: paulwxford

title: messages previously marked as junk no longer going into the junk fileThese
content: How do I get these messages from AEON, Amazon and ECT which appear to be in either Japanese or Chinese ( I have no knowledge of either) and which are totally unsolicited go again straight into my junk file when I open up email. Having to open them individually in order to junk them wastes a lot of time.

title: Firefox Sync and Save Data Login Issue after Firefox 115 Update
content:
After the recent Firefox 115 update, I tried to sync my tabs and access the mobile tabs in my PC but it was not working... It was showing an old synced tab list.. I tried multiple times and nothing happened... So I logged out of my account and logged in again but this time I couldn't login... So I uninstalled my Firefox app and installed it again but it still didn't work.

What happens is... I use the login button in sync feature... It shows to scan a barcode from pc or through email (i tried both)... I use my PC to login in... It logs in but as soon as I go back or open the firefox app again... It goes back to the same login again mode... I have tried it multiple times... This is all shown in the pictures given below.

Whatâ€™s causing this and how do I solve it? Some feedback will be helpful as I can't use my mobile and PC properly... All the addons, preference are gone for now.
creator: Imsar53

title: new window opening small but maximized somehow
